language_changer_chat:
Here you can change the language used for the bot in the entire chat.
If your language is not listed here and you would like to contribute, head over @AlisuChat.
language_changer_private: Here you can change the language used for the bot in this private chat. If you want to change your group's language, please run the /setchatlang command inside it. If your language is not listed here and you would like to contribute, head over @AlisuChat.
